item.title: How to fix an MZ-R55
item.description: I fixed a minidisc player…kinda? I got a minidisc player/recorder from my grandma’s friend in 2017, an MZ-R55 with a low battery error. Basically, it didn’t work, no matter how much you charged the gumstick battery. Three years later, I got it working! The video is not mine, but basically just demonstrates the state that I found myself at around 7 pm. MZ-R55 manual Sed a leo id risus venenatis vulputate non quis nulla.
